description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between BESTIA and Marsborne in the FiReCONTER Group C, scheduled for January 31 at 8:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "BESTIA" if BESTIA wins 2 or more maps than Marsborne in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Marsborne".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between BESTIA and Marsborne in the FiReCONTER Group C, scheduled for January 31 at 8:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "BESTIA" if BESTIA win the match against Marsborne.

This market will resolve to "Marsborne" if Marsborne win the match against BESTIA.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://hltv.org/.
events.title: Counter-Strike: BESTIA vs Marsborne (BO3) - FiReCONTER Group C

question: Map Handicap: BST (-1.5) vs Marsborne (+1.5)
